company.headline: About the developer
company.p1: At Zyrbagan Residences LTD, we specialize in creating exceptional residential projects that combine luxury, sustainability, and timeless design. Based in Cyprus, our company is dedicated to delivering homes that inspire and elevate the living experience. Each of our developments reflects a commitment to quality, innovation, and the perfect balance of comfort and elegance, providing lasting value for our residents.
company.p2: Over the years, we have established a strong reputation for excellence through our premium developments and partnerships with leading design firms. One of our most valued collaborations is with Porto Buro, a renowned architectural and design studio. Known for their timeless aesthetic and modern classical style, Porto Buro’s designs seamlessly integrate elegance and functionality.
company.p3: Together with Porto Buro, we have successfully delivered projects like:
company.li1: an exclusive collection of luxury homes that showcase meticulous craftsmanship and stylish design
company.li2: where every detail is thoughtfully curated to provide a sophisticated, yet comfortable living experience.
company.p4: With Park Residences, we have created a community that embodies the best of our philosophy. Situated in the picturesque village of Pervolia, just 1.3 km from the Mediterranean Sea, this project features stunning apartments enriched by Porto Buro’s signature style, advanced technologies, and premium materials.

Situated in the picturesque village of Pervolia, just 1.3 km from the Mediterranean Sea, this project features stunning apartments enriched by Porto Buro’s signature style, advanced technologies, and premium materials.

navbar.Slogan: The best way to be healthy is to be happy

about.headline: About the project
about.li1: Beautiful location with a park and a playground
about.li4: Proximity to the school and kindergarten:
about.li5: Utilizing solar energy with 340 sunny days for comfort and economy
about.li6: Sea view apartments from the 2nd floor

gallery.headline: Interior
gallery.description: The design of Park Residences is created in modern classical style, ensuring timeless elegance that will remain relevant for years to come. Each image showcases the essence of our upscale apartments, contemporary comforts, and sustainable living.

gallery2.headline: Exterior
gallery2.description: The design of Park Residences is created in modern classical style, ensuring timeless elegance that will remain relevant for years to come. Each image showcases the essence of our upscale apartments, contemporary comforts, and sustainable living.

units.headline: Apartments
units.description: Select the perfect apartment that aligns with your preferences, needs, and budget. Our range includes 1 to 3-bedroom options.

benefits.headline: Benefits
benefits.description: The advantage of our project Park Residences is technology and quality, every detail is thought out and implemented by our designers, engineers, designers Porto Buro, the use of quality building and finishing materials, recuperation, warm floors, fireplaces, solar panels and many other technological things, make our project exclusive, economical, comfortable to live in any season.
benefits.qualityDescription: Our buildings are known for their exceptional quality. We focus on durability and design, ensuring every detail is crafted to perfection.
benefits.solarDescription: Solar panels offer more than environmental advantages; they significantly ease the utilization of existing infrastructure, such as a pool and a gym, due to considerable reductions in electricity costs, enhancing operational efficiency.
benefits.communityDescription: Our neighborhood features charming paths and a large park, with no further construction to preserve its tranquility.

contact.headline: Contact Us
contact.privacyPolicy: By sending this form, you agree to our privacy policy.

errors.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.phoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number.

footer.address: A: 90 Spyrou Kyprianou, Kontopyrgos Tower, Office 202, 6052 Larnaca, Cyprus

location.title: Location
location.description: Nestled in the heart of Pervolia, just a stone's throw from the historical city of Larnaca, Park Residences offers an exclusive enclave of 19 meticulously designed premium apartments. Park Residences is more than a residence; it's a commitment to a greener future and a nod to the historical richness of Pervolia.

gym.title: Private Gym
gym.description: Company Park Residences offers its residents access to a private gym. The private gym is equipped with state-of-the-art fitness equipment, catering to a wide range of preferences and fitness levels. From cardio machines to free weights, resistance training equipment, and dedicated areas for yoga and stretching.

solarPanels.title: Solar Panels
solarPanels.description: Solar panels offer more than environmental advantages; they significantly ease the utilization of existing infrastructure, such as a pool and a gym, due to considerable reductions in electricity costs, enhancing operational efficiency.

pool.title: Indoor Pool
pool.description: Company Park Residences extends its commitment to the well-being of its residents by offering access to an exclusive indoor pool. This facility is designed to engage in a healthy, active lifestyle regardless of the season.

singleFlatGallery.description: Explore Park Residences's gallery: elegant interiors that speak comfort, stunning exteriors blending with nature, and captivating views that promise tranquility. Experience the luxury of living here through each carefully curated image.
